articles.title: DPRK Delegate Discloses Human Rights Situation in Western Countries, S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Discloses Human Rights Situation in Western Countries, S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate disclosed the human rights situation in the U.S. and other Western countries and south Korea at the 34th Session of the UN Human Rights Council on March 15.
					 The delegate said:
					
					 Humankind has long desired to lead a happy life while enjoying genuine human rights in a peaceful world free from aggression and war. However, this desire is faced with serious challenges.
					
					 Right at this moment, many and various forms of gross human rights violations are being committed in different countries and regions of the world.
					
					 The U.S. is the worst-ever tundra of human rights in the world and the ringleader and the mastermind of human rights violations as well.
					
					 Cases in point are the extreme xenophobia and racial discrimination, gun-related crimes that claim many lives, an army of the homeless, the unemployed and street people and parental abuse that takes the life of children, and the record high number of prisoners, which makes up a quarter of the world. These are no more than a tip of deplorable human rights violations in the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S.-led human rights violations abroad are in particular appalling the whole world. Wherever the U.S. sets its bloody foot in, there follow endless streams of blood of humankind. Counted among them are the establishment of scores of overseas secret prisons, their brutal torture atrocities and massive civilian casualties and 65.3 million refugees resulting from the aggression against sovereign states committed by the U.S. under the pretext of "war on terrorism".
					
					 The international community and the UN Human Rights Council should no longer tolerate such human rights violations of the U.S. but work collectively to pressurize it into being accountable for its wrongdoings without delay. 
					
					 Next comes the EU, a group of human rights abusers, which is little better than the U.S.
					
					 Recent years have witnessed within the member states of the EU such unprecedented, uncontrollable state-sponsored human rights violations as Islamophobia, xenophobia and minority abuse, revival of neo-Nazism, and the massive deportation, forced repatriation and forfeiture of property of tens of thousands of refugees.
					
					 It is in the EU countries that even basic human rights are not guaranteed. Thousands of refugees fell victims to human trafficking, sexual abuse and forced labor and many people are still living under the poverty line.
					
					 The EU would be well advised to get rid of its bad habit of backbiting others and fix its own deplorable human rights situation first. 
					
					 Japan is a classic human rights violator and criminal state that evades the admission of its past heinous crimes against humanity, let alone making apology and compensation.
					
					 The invasion into Korea and many other Asian countries, the massacre of civilians in those countries and the forced sexual slavery of 200 000 Korean women for the Imperial Japanese army are only part of the crimes against humanity committed by Japan in the last century. No statute of limitations is applicable to such crimes.
					
					 Japan claims that it has agreed with south Korea to settle the issue of sexual slavery with its deceptive apology and a trifle sum of money. This is a mockery of the international community and a contemporary form of deception. Japan should unconditionally admit its heinous crimes against humanity and make an apology and compensation for them without delay before it is too late. 
					
					 South Korea is by far the worst tundra of human rights in the world. 
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the notorious "security law" of south Korea is the one and only fascist law in the world that legalizes human rights violations. 
					
					 It will take ages to enumerate the human rights violations in south Korea, including the forced disbandment of progressive opposition party, the brutal crackdown on pro-reunification forces, the Ferry Sewol disaster that drowned 300 children and the connivance at such cruel atrocities committed by the U.S. troops present in south Korea as sexual abuse and murder.
					
					 In April last year, in particular, the south Korean regime commanded gangsters of its Intelligence Service to abduct more than 10 women citizens of the DPRK in Ningbo of China and is still refusing to provide any information on their existence. This is the first-ever group abduction and heinous crime against humanity in the 21st century. 
					
					 The fact that Park Geun Hye completely severed the inter-Korean relations and openly agitated "defection from the north", believing in the bluff of a shaman that the DPRK would "collapse within a couple of years," vividly tells us that the group abduction was also a joint work and conspiracy from start to finish of the shaman and Park.
					
					 The south Korean regime is the first-ever terrorist ring and den of demons that are keen on committing unscrupulous group abductions to produce many more separated families, while turning a blind eye to the immense sufferings from the national division and territorial split caused by outsiders upon our nation for over half a century. Such terrorists and demons should be brought to justice as soon as possible. 
					
					 The families of the victims of the group abduction submitted twice last year and again in January this year, letters to the UN secretary-general, the high commissioner for Human Rights and the president of the Human Rights Council, asking for help in the repatriation of victims to their families as early as possible. They are still anxiously looking forward to a positive reply. 
					
					 The UN human rights mechanisms should bring the south Korean authorities to justice and call on south Korea to send back the victims to their families at once. 
					
					 The DPRK is a people-centered socialist state where people are placed at the centre of all considerations and everything serves them. 
					
					 All the people in our country are now fully enjoying their independent and genuine rights while leading a happy and carefree life, with firm confidence and optimism about their future, which are ensured by the politics of affording priority, respect and love to the people of our respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to crush the ever-more exacerbated moves by the hostile forces to isolate and stifle it and further consolidate and develop the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: KCNA Detailed Report on All-People Resistance in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Detailed Report on All-People Resistance in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency issued a detailed report Tuesday to inform the people of the historical facts of all-people resistance in south Korea which dealt a heavy blow at heinous traitor Park Geun Hye and shook the pro-U.S. fascist dictatorship to its every foundation.
					 The report said:
					
					 The all-people resistance that lasted more than 130 days since the end of October 2016 was an eruption of the pent-up wrath and indignation of the south Koreans against Park Geun Hye, chieftain of dictatorship and kingpin of corruption and irregularities, who pursued unpopular rule and sycophancy toward outsiders and escalated confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Wrath against Park mounted high across the south Korean society as she turned south Korea into the medieval dark land and the barren land of democracy, livelihood and people's rights through the revival of "yusin" dictatorship and unpopular rule while treating people as dogs and pigs.
					
					 It was against this backdrop that there broke out Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal, the hideous case of abuse of power, in October last.
					
					 All the people, young and old, including workers, farmers, lawmakers from the opposition parties, professors, housewives, the aged, and university, high and middle school students and pupils and children, took to the streets holding candlelight.
					
					 The declaration on the situation made public by the students and teachers of Ehwa Woman's University became a starting point of the movement for issuing declarations on the situation that swept universities.
					
					 This movement was joined in by high school students, to say nothing of workers, farmers, academic and cultural and arts organizations across south Korea.
					
					 Repugnancy against Park and distrust in the present regime grew even among the conservative forces.
					
					 The candlelight action of south Koreans was unprecedented all-people resistance.
					
					 The people's emergency action for resignation of Park Geun Hye regime was formed with the involvement of more than 1,550 organizations across south Korea, including the 2016 Headquarters for People's All-out Action and the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations, on Nov. 9 last year.
					
					 The number of organizations that joined in the emergency action increased to more than 2 300 with the steady expansion of the ranks of protesters.
					
					 All the people, irrespective of affiliation, political view, sex and age, took part in the action for impeachment of Park.
					
					 In the period from the first candlelight action on Oct. 29 to the sixth candlelight action on Dec. 3, a total of over 5.03 million people took part in rallies and demonstrations in Seoul while a total of more than 1.28 million in provinces.
					
					 The number of participants in more than 20 massive candlelight actions that began from the end of October last and lasted on March 11 to celebrate the impeachment of Park hit an all time high of a total of 17 million.
					
					 The all-people resistance was held in diverse forms and ways.
					
					 Media including newspapers and broadcasting services reported the candlelight actions as breaking news, detailing the public demand and stand.
					
					 In keeping with the south Koreans' candlelight actions for the impeachment of Park, Koreans residing in different parts of the world including the U.S., Japan, Canada, France and Germany held solidarity candlelight actions, movement for issuing declarations on the situation and demonstrations.
					
					 The all-people resistance of south Koreans for bringing about new society of independence, democracy and reunification, was a fierce battle against sycophants and traitors and conservative forces.
					
					 The puppet group of conservatives issued a white paper praising the administrative records of Park in a desperate bid to maintain the worn-out policy against the nation, reunification and people.
					
					 Puppet acting president Hwang Kyo An, an accomplice of Park, checked special investigation into Chongwadae and stood against the extension of the investigation period and the puppet Intelligence Service saw to it that mobile phones of high-ranking officials were scrapped to remove evidence of crimes.
					
					 The civic and public organizations including the people's emergency action and people from all walks of life intensified their actions, saying that the candlelight revolution should not end as an uncompleted civic revolution just like the June resistance in 1987, and calling for bringing down Park by force if words do not work.
					
					 In the face of determined struggle waged by the awakened people, the special investigation and the "constitutional court" could not but confirm the crimes of Park and make a final decision on impeachment on March 6 and 10.
					
					 The all-people resistance which left a clear mark in the history of the south Koreans' struggle proved that force of injustice going against the desire of people and trend of the times while lording it over the people is bound to ruin and nothing can match the united strength of people based on justice and truth.
					
					 The detailed report stressed that the miserable fate of Park and the conservative group is a deserved one they faced for the thrice-cursed crimes committed through sycophancy toward outsiders, escalated confrontation with the fellow countrymen, unpopular rule, fascist dictatorship and corruption and irregularities.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on March 16 to mark the 68th anniversary of the signing of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the political parities, government, ministries, organizations and institutions of Russia including the secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is also chief of the Russia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma of Russia, the roving ambassador of the Foreign Ministry, the editor-in-chief of the newspaper Zavtra, officials of the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Culture, the Ministry of Energy, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Russkiy Mir Foundation, the Academy of Sciences, TASS and Interfax.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials were present.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before an art work depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together before paying tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Meanwhile, receptions were given at the DPRK missions in Vladivostok and Khabarovsk on March 17.

articles.title: Russian Diplomats Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
Russian Diplomats Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on Tuesday to mark the 68th anniversary of the signing of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 The guests paid tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung waving back to the columns of the military parade at the square for celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 They laid bouquets at the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid tribute to the service personnel of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 They went round various rooms of the museum, being briefed on the fact that the army and people of the DPRK defeated for the first time in history the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, and honorably protected the freedom and independence of the country and the revolutionary gains.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Pro-reunification Patriotic Fighter
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Pro-reunification Patriotic Fighter
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighter Choe Ha Jong, a former unconverted long-term prisoner, marked his 90th birthday.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to him on Tuesday.
					
					 Born in Kim Chaek City of North Hamgyong Province on March 21, Juche 16 (1927), Choe keenly experienced the distress-torn history of the nation from his childhood. He devoted himself to the building of a new country with his single desire to live up to the care of President Kim Il Sung who liberated the country and built a genuine society for the people.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War he joined the Korean People's Army and courageously fought in the war. While fighting heroically for the country's reunification, he was arrested by the enemy. However, he didn't abandon the revolutionary principle for 36 years.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il awarded him the wrist watch bearing the august name of the President, the title of hero of the Republic and the National Reunification Prize in high appreciation of his feats and took warm care of him so that he could lead a happy life in the socialist motherland.
					
					 Kim Jong Un bestowed upon him such honor of being invited to the celebrations of the 100th birth anniversary of the President and the 4th National Conference of War Veterans and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. And he has taken warm care of him so that he can glorify his life as a pro-reunification patriotic fighter full of energy despite his advanced age.

articles.title: Environmental Measuring Instrument Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Environmental Measuring Instrument Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Researching groups of the Institute of Medical Science under the Ministry of Public Health and Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK jointly developed an environmental measuring instrument suited to the specific conditions of the country.
					 The instrument is low in production cost and measures micro-density air pollutants accurately.
					
					 In this regard, Jong Sang Hyon, director of the Institute of Medical Science, told KCNA:
					
					 Researchers of the institute fully solved technical problems arising in manufacturing the measuring instrument.
					
					 They newly designed a real-time air pollution monitoring system, which can measure pollutants in the air and atmospheric temperature and humidity in a comprehensive way.
					
					 They also developed a classifier to measure the density of materials harmful to human body in air dust.
					
					 And the research group of Kim Chaek University of Technology made a drive circuit of gas sensor for the environmental measuring instrument.
					
					 Its application proved that all measurements reached the world level in accuracy.

articles.title: Rungna Dolphinarium Crowded with Citizens
articles.content:
Rungna Dolphinarium Crowded with Citizens
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The Rungna Dolphinarium in Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, recently draws more visitors by putting seal tricks on the stage.
					 Kim Jin Hyok, a trainer, told KCNA:
					
					 Seals were brought to the dolphinarium from the East Sea of Korea and tamed to play tricks.
					
					 They gave its premiere by doing a few tricks like greeting and handshaking in April last year. But now, they are performing such diverse movements as shooting balls into basket, balancing themselves with balls on snout and hind feet and passing through rings, being applauded by audience.
					
					 They are 1.5 meters in length and weigh almost 60 kilograms.

articles.title: Country Free of Tax
articles.content:
Country Free of Tax
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- It has been 43 years since the tax system was totally abolished in the DPRK.
					 On March 21, 1974, the law "On abolishing the Tax System" was promulgated at the 3rd Session of the 5th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 Since then, the DPRK became the first country free of tax in the world.
					
					 During Japan's colonial rule over Korea, the Korean nation had suffered from the deadly taxation system enforced by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth the abolition of all the sundry taxes imposed by the Japanese imperialists and establishment of the most popular tax system as one of "The Ten-Point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" in the period of anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 After the country's liberation, he put forward a detailed Juche-oriented taxation program in the Twenty-Point Platform and saw to it that the depredatory tax system of the Japanese imperialists was abolished and the most popular and democratic tax system established.
					
					 Later, the President advanced a historic task for entirely abolishing the tax system and took a measure to eliminate the agricultural tax in kind between 1964 and 1966.
					
					 And he saw to it that the provision on abrogating the income tax and rates of local autonomy was added to the Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Under his guidance, the 8th Plenary Meeting of the 5th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea held in February 1974 decided on the abolition of the tax system and the law on abolishing the tax system was adopted and promulgated in March that year.
					
					 At that time, peoples of the world highly praised the abolition of tax system in the DPRK as an event of great significance, the first of its kind in human history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Socialist Education
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Socialist Education
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Strengthening the socialist education is a fundamental requirement for consolidating the political and ideological position of the Korean revolution in every way, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea remains unchanged in its stand to intensify the ideological work with firm grip on ideology as the revolution and construction are gaining in depth.
					
					 Strengthening the socialist education is an important requirement for hastening the victory in the drive to build a powerful socialist country through uninterrupted innovations and progress and successive offensive.
					
					 Only when the socialist education is intensified, can all fabrics of society be pervaded with faith in sure victory and optimism and indomitable offensive-oriented spirit and fighting spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The socialist education means the steady ideological campaign, the dynamic spirit of all-out drive of the people and gun roar for the victory in the drive for building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 It is the precious philosophical principle that socialism is sure to win, if a firm grip on the ideology is made, but it is bound to go to doom, if ideology is abandoned. 
					
					 The editorial calls for intensifying the ideological education to arm officials and party members and other people with the socialist idea as required by the times and the developing reality so as to consolidate the political and ideological position of the Korean revolution and put strong spurs to the victorious advance of socialism.

articles.title: U.S. Muscle Flexing Has Gone beyond Red Line: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Muscle Flexing Has Gone beyond Red Line: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. military confrontation hysteria against the DPRK has gone beyond red line, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The joint military exercises which the U.S. stages on the Korean peninsula every year are not aimed to cope with the "threats and provocation" from the north but prompted by their scenario to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the largest-ever Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills being staged by the U.S. programs of which are being updated with more dangerous operations every year. 
					
					 The DPRK can no longer remain a passive onlooker to the situation as the U.S. is running amuck to infringe upon its supreme interests by hurling even troops of vassal countries.
					
					 The present situation in which the U.S. poses a grave threat to the supreme interests and security of the DPRK compels the latter to take a strong countermeasure for self-defence, the toughest step.
					
					 It is the unshakable guts and will of the Korean army and people to counter the enemy's hard-line policy with the toughest action.
					
					 Once the DPRK opens fire, the enemy will suffer the deadliest-ever shower of fire and the provocateurs and their stooges will have to pay a dear price.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges Japan to Redress Its Past
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges Japan to Redress Its Past
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A girl statue of peace, symbolic of the crimes related to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, was erected in a park in Bayern State in southern Germany on March 8.
					 Girl statues of peace have been erected in the U.S., Canada, Australia, China and North America and in the Asia-Pacific but it is the first time it was built in Europe.
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says: This hints that the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army will continue to be tabled as an important agenda in the world politics and more girl statues will be erected in different parts of the world.
					
					 World public is erecting girl statues in different parts of the world because the settlement of the issue is urgently required for the peace and development of humankind, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Japan is sensitively reacting to any slightest moves revealing its dark intention as it abhors admitting its past crimes and fears facing justice.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have so far run the whole gamut of sleight of hand to check the erection of girl statues, fretting themselves whenever more statues are built in several parts of the world including the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 The fact that more statues are appearing despite Japan's desperate efforts to check their erection suggests something big to the people.
					
					 Japan's redemption of its past is not only the will of history but the unanimous demand of the international community.
					
					 Japan has to make a bold decision to part with the dirty past and make a new start at an early date, bearing in mind its future hinges on its redemption of past.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime continues to kick up the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign in collusion with the U.S.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article:
					
					 It is absurd and shameless for them to orchestrate such farce though they are beset with the world's most serious human rights issues and, therefore, are not in a position to take issue with other's affairs.
					
					 It is crystal clear that the puppet regime's racket is prompted by a sinister ploy to tarnish the dignified image of the DPRK emerging victorious with the tremendous military muscle and the might of self-reliance and self-development and bring down its ideology and social system.
					
					 It is the stirring reality of the DPRK that all the people fully enjoy human rights in all aspects of social life thanks to the popular policies of the Party and the state.
					
					 The world's fair public terms the puppet regime's anti-DPRK "human rights" racket heinous political provocation to do harm to the dignified social system of the DPRK and spits at its worn-out trumpeting about "human rights situation in the north." 
					
					 The said ruckus is nothing but foolish efforts to weather the worst ruling crisis.
					
					 It is a stereotyped method of the puppet ruling quarters to desperately cling to the confrontation with the DPRK with their doomsday drawing nearer.
					
					 The wretched plight of most evil woman Park Geun Hye clearly showed what high price quislings would have to pay for going against the aspiration and desire of the people and truth and justice, being backed by foreign forces.
					
					 Their anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign can never be a way out.

articles.title: Papers Sneer at S. Korean Conservative Group's Wretched Plight
articles.content:
Papers Sneer at S. Korean Conservative Group's Wretched Plight
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK Tuesday carry commentaries on the symptoms of doom the ultra-right conservative forces of south Korea revealed in various aspects in the wake of the impeachment of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 Far from acknowledging the stern punishment meted out to Park and making an apology for her unpardonable crimes, the south Korean group of traitors are still going reckless, harboring grudge, only to be cursed by the public, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This reflects the wretched plight of the puppet conservative group without any elementary guilty conscience and bereft of human qualities.
					
					 As widely known, the ultra-right conservative gangsters in south Korea intimidated the public by blustering that impeachment would give rise to a catastrophic situation like rebellion, ahead of the impeachment trial of traitor Park.
					
					 But they were totally exasperated by the court's decision on impeachment of Park and are now deploring their plight of having nothing to do.
					
					 Some stupid ones of the "Association of Love for Park Geun Hye" frequented the old home of Park at Samsong-dong, Seoul, to volunteer for her guard, only to be censured by the public.
					
					 This is just the unavoidable plight of the conservative betes noires prolonging their remaining days by flattering such human scum as Park, and a due punishment by the public.
					
					 Minju Joson says the ultra-right conservative forces are bound to meet a miserable plight as they worked hard to stop the wheel of history.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Is Bound to Be Jailed: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Is Bound to Be Jailed: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye still remains venomous though she was driven out of Chongwadae after becoming the "first impeached president" in the south Korean history of politics.
					 She should have reflected on her wrongdoings, though belatedly, after being impeached for her thrice-cursed crimes. But she is making last-ditch efforts to seek a way out in denying the impeachment.
					
					 Pleading for her "innocence" and asserting she was "falsely charged" to create impression that her denial of impeachment is just, she works hard not to serve a prison term by instigating her private organization called "Samsongdong Team."
					
					 She categorically denies 13 charges brought by the prosecution and the ad-hoc investigation team against her and is going busy reinforcing her defense counsel to cope with prosecution's forthcoming investigation.
					
					 This brazen-faced act of blatantly challenging the stern judgment by justice and the public sheds light on the hideous nature of a viper spewing out venom till her last breath.
					
					 The decision on impeachment serves as a crucial warning of history as it proved that such hideous traitor as Park is bound to meet doom.
					
					 Park met due punishment for her countless crimes.
					
					 This being a hard fact, Park is totally denying her crimes that stunned the pubic, talking about "truth." This is just paradox of a psychopath.
					
					 People of various circles in south Korea are bitterly criticizing her behavior, terming it "height of arrogance" and "protest against history and people." Voices of criticism are being heard even from the "Liberal Korea Party."
					
					 South Korean media are ridiculing her denial as "reckless act of a wart trying to stop a cart wheel." In actuality, it is not exaggeration to say that Park has met her today's pitiful plight for her stupidity and recklessness of misjudging the trend of the times.
					
					 She might have escaped such miserable fate if she had expressed her will to resign and stepped down in time after properly understanding the public mindset manifested in their candlelight actions that swept south Korea.
					
					 However, Park went against the public mindset to the end, calling for her defense counsel to refute and wooing her bribed conservative gangsters into staging rallies to counter the public candlelight actions.
					
					 Finally, she pricked her eyes with her fingers.
					
					 Park is so foolish as to remain undaunted to make her last-ditch efforts now that she has become a being of straw with no authority after failing to prevent the impeachment at a back room of Chongwadae.
					
					 Park should be jailed for hundreds of times for her crimes so far disclosed.
					
					 Park is still going reckless, counting on the stupid guys visiting her old home with blind worship, but she will meet more miserable end if she persists in going against the public mindset.
					
					 Prison life is her unavoidable tragic fate.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hit at Hwang Kyo An's Trumpeting about Confrontation
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hit at Hwang Kyo An's Trumpeting about Confrontation
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- Hwang Kyo An, puppet acting president of south Korea, is busy inciting confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north even after traitor Park Geun Hye's removal from her office.
					 No sooner had the Constitutional Court finally decided on Park's impeachment than Hwang phoned to Han Min Gu, minister of Defense, and Yun Pyong Se, foreign minister, stressing the need to fully prepare for instant counteraction to deter the provocative will of the north and any provocation and boost south Korea-U.S. cooperation and cooperation with the friendly country to cope with the north's nuclear and missile provocation.
					
					 In his "talk to people" with regard to impeachment of Park, Hwang spouted such litany of vitriol as "nuclear and missile threats from the north" and "firm security" and convened a security meeting to issue an order to the whole army to be on high alert.
					
					 Days ago he went to the wartime commanding post of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea to cry out for taking firm security posture to prevent the north from making reckless provocation after misjudging the situation in south Korea as unprecedented emergency was created by the decision of the Constitutional Court on impeachment.
					
					 These are nothing but foolish behaviors to tide over the present ruling crisis created by the impeachment of Park which left the worst blot in the history of south Korean politics and divert the world criticism and derision elsewhere.
					
					 No matter how desperately he tries to create "security crisis" and "instability", he can never cover up the huge crimes of the Park Geun Hye group and dodge the public criticism of them.
					
					 Hwang is the traitor to be punished by history together with Park before anyone else as he is the arch accomplice in creating the present crisis in south Korea.
					
					 From the outset of the year, he revealed a cynical ploy to steadily pursue the traitorous "policy toward the north" pursued by Park, who was branded as dregs of history, talking about "maintaining key point" and "abiding by principles". He went the lengths of floating even the "story of provocation by the north in February." 
					
					 Hwang is the pro-Park bete noire who should be eliminated at an early date, as he is crying out for confrontation with the north, far from drawing a lesson from the miserable end Park met due to the public severe punishment.
					
					 He seeks to evade the responsibility for the crisis, making last-ditch efforts to rally the conservative forces under the pretext of "security crisis". This is the intolerable mockery and insult to the public mindset in south Korea.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of the south Korean people to make a clean sweep of all the dregs of history and greet a new spring.
					
					 Such fools as Hwang are bound to be sent to the cemetery of history.

articles.title: All-people Meeting against THAAD Deployment Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-people Meeting against THAAD Deployment Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The all-people meeting to nullify the source of illegal THAAD and stop its deployment was held in Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea, designated as a place for deploying THAAD, U.S. war equipment for aggression, on Mar. 18, according to a report.
					 Present there were members of civic and social organizations including the Confederation of Trade Unions and the Solidarity for Social Progress, citizens from all walks of life and lawmakers from opposition parties.
					
					 The participants held the meeting outside a building in Chojon-myon of the county.
					
					 A resolution was read out there.
					
					 It said that the THAAD deployment is for meeting the interests of the U.S. and Japan, not for defending south Korea.
					
					 The act of pressing for the deployment of THAAD is little short of going against the mind-set of candlelight demonstrators, it said, adding:
					
					 If the U.S. persistently sticks to crude and hegemonic acts, the anger of 17 million candlelight holders will be directed toward the U.S.
					
					 We will hold the 2nd all-people meeting on April 8 together with the people of candlelight protesters aspiring after independence and peace in order to check the THAAD deployment of the U.S. and the authorities.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants held a rally after marching to the Lotte Golf Links. They gathered in Sosong-ri again and held a candlelight rally.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Halt to Joint Military Maneuvers
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Halt to Joint Military Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on March 19 urged the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers to stop the nuclear war drills at once.
					 The editorial accused them of openly staging nuclear war maneuvers after discarding the signboard of "annual" and "defensive".
					
					 It demanded the U.S. and south Korean authorities stop Key Resolve at once as it brings the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 What is needed for peace on the Korean peninsula is pullout of the U.S. forces and conclusion of DPRK-U.S. peace accord, not deployment of THAAD and war games, it said.

articles.title: S. Korea: U.S. Urged Not to Press for Implementation of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korea: U.S. Urged Not to Press for Implementation of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People on Mar. 17 in an editorial demanded that the U.S. not press for the implementation of the south Korea-Japan agreement on the comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The editorial accused U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson of expressing his wish to see the present regime in south Korea and the new regime after the presidential election implement the agreement on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese army at the U.S.-Japan diplomatic talks held in Tokyo on Mar. 16, adding this is no more than an undisguised interference in the south Korean "presidential" election.
					
					 To reexamine the "agreement" on the sexual slavery is the matter to be decided by the south Koreans and the regime, not the issue which allows the U.S. interference, it said.

articles.title: GIs in S. Korea Smuggle Drugs
articles.content:
GIs in S. Korea Smuggle Drugs
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- GIs in south Korea smuggled drugs worth tens of billions won through personal army mail boxes in two places, according to the south Korean CBS on March 15.
					 Until now there were cases of smuggling of drugs such as cocaine through U.S. forces mail boxes but it is the first time that a large amount of hiroppon was smuggled.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Peru
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "The Public Health Law of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" was brought out in booklet by a Peruvian publishing house on Mar. 15 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovakia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovakia
 Pyongyang, March 21 (KCNA) -- A Slovak preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Bratislava on March 11.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting and Studying the Juche Idea and chairman of the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from March 11 to April 20 and decided to organize a lecture, film show and other colorful political and cultural events praising revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Delegado coreano critica deplorable situacion de DDHH de EE.UU., el Occidente y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Delegado coreano critica deplorable situacion de DDHH de EE.UU., el Occidente y el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- En la 34a reunion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, sesionada el dia 15, el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea critico la deplorable situacion de derechos humanos de Estados Unidos, el Occidente y el Sur de Corea.
					Ahora tropieza con graves desafios el deseo de la humanidad de vivir felizmente ejerciendo genuinos derechos humanos en un nuevo mundo pacifico sin agresiones y guerras, dijo el delegado y continuo:
					
					En este momento tambien, se cometen graves actos de violacion de derechos humanos en varios paises y regiones del mundo.
					
					En particular, EE.UU. es la tierra infernal para derechos humanos y el violador No.1 de DDHH en el mundo. 
					
					En la sociedad estadounidense se reportan incontables casos de misantropia, discriminacion racial y uso de armas de fuego que dejan como saldo muchas perdidas humanas.
					
					Hay un gran contingente de vagabundos y desempleados y pierden la vida los infantes por el maltrato de sus padres.
					
					El numero de prisioneros norteamericanos ocupa el 25% de la poblacion encarcelada del mundo. Estos hechos no pasan de ser una minima parte de la deplorable situacion de DDHH de EE.UU. 
					
					De otro lado, en los paises miembros de la Union Europea no se garantizan ni los elementales derechos humanos, por ejemplo, miles de refugiados se hacen victimas del trafico de personas, maltrato sexual y trabajo forzado y muchas personas viven por debajo de la linea de pobreza. 
					
					La UE debe dejar el vicio de censurar a otros y arreglar primero la miserable situacion de DDHH de casa.
					
					Japon, tipico Estado criminal y violador de derechos humanos, se niega a reconocer sus intolerables crimenes de lesa humanidad cometidos en el siglo pasado, lejos de pedir perdon e indemnizar. 
					
					El Sur de Corea es el lugar donde se violan de la peor manera los derechos humanos en este planeta. 
					
					Sin tener en consideracion las indecibles desgracias que sufre la nacion coreana durante mas de medio siglo debido a la division del territorio nacional, causada por las fuerzas extranjeras, las autoridades surcoreanas, horda de terroristas y diablos, se dedican a aumentar el numero de los familiares separados cometiendo sin escrupulos el rapto en grupo. 
					
					En el futuro tambien, la RPDC consolidara mas el regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares frustrando las brutales maniobras de las fuerzas hostiles encaminadas a aislarla y aplastarla.

articles.title: ACNC publica informacion detallada sobre sublevacion popular anti-Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC publica informacion detallada sobre sublevacion popular anti-Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea publico el dia 21 una informacion detallada sobre la sublevacion de la poblacion surcoreana que castigo duro a la traidora Park Geun-hye y sacudio de raiz el cimiento de la dictadura fascista proyanqui.
					Segun la nota, la resistencia popular, desarrollada durante mas de 130 dias desde finales de octubre de 2016, fue la explosion del rencor y colera de la poblacion surcoreana contra la traidora Park Geun-hye, caudilla de la dictadura y de los casos de irregularidades y corrupcion, que practicaba las politicas antipopulares y recurria al servilismo a grandes potencias, a los actos vendepatrias y al enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					En la sociedad surcoreana se ha acumulado la indignacion hacia la traidora Park que tratando como animales al pueblo, convirtio el suelo surcoreano en la tierra medieval y peor infierno privado de democracia y derechos humanos con sus politicas antipopulares y tentativas de resucitar la dictadura de "Yusin".
					
					En tales circunstancias, ocurrio en octubre del ano pasado el inaudito "escandalo de Park Geun-hye y Choe Sun Sil", o sea, incidente de manipulacion chapucera de los "asuntos estatales" por Park y los familiares de Choe. 
					
					Se levantaron en la lucha con velas todos los habitantes surcoreanos, sin distincion de sexos y edades, entre otros, los obreros, campesinos, diputados de la oposicion, profesores, amas de casa, ancianos, estudiantes, alumnos de la secundaria y de la superior y los ninos. 
					
					Las estudiantes y profesores de la Universidad Femenina de Rihwa publicaron la declaracion sobre la situacion, lo cual se extendio a todas las universidades. 
					
					Se incorporaron en el mismo movimiento no solo las entidades laborales, campesinas, academicas, culturales y artisticas, sino tambien los alumnos de las escuelas superiores. 
					
					Dentro de las fuerzas conservadoras tambien se incrementaron la antipatia hacia Park Geun-hye y la inquietud sobre el mantenimiento del "poder". 
					
					La lucha con velas de la poblacion surcoreana fue la sublevacion sin precedentes en la historia del Sur de Corea. 
					
					El 9 de noviembre del ano pasado fue constituida la Accion Emergente de la Poblacion para la dimision del "poder" de Park Geun-hye, integrada por mas de mil 550 entidades de todas las localidades del Sur de Corea incluso la Direccion de Movilizacion General del Pueblo de 2016.
					
					Con el paso del tiempo llego a mas de 2 mil 300 el numero de las entidades participantes en la Accion Emergente de la Poblacion. 
					
					Todos los habitantes surcoreanos se levantaron en la lucha por la dimision de Park Geun-hye por encima de las diferencias de las afiliaciones, criterios politicos, sexos y edades.
					
					En el periodo desde la primera lucha con velas desarrollada el 29 de octubre hasta la sexta librada el 3 de diciembre, participaron en Seul mas de 5 millones 30 mil habitantes en total en los mitines y manifestaciones, y mas de un millon 280 mil en otras localidades. 
					
					Desde finales de octubre del ano expirado hasta el 11 de marzo del ano en curso en que se aprobo la dimision de Park Geun-hye, se desarrollo en 20 ocasiones la lucha masiva con velas con la participacion de 17 millones de habitantes en total, cifra nunca vista antes en la historia de las sublevaciones populares. 
					
					Ademas, la lucha de la poblacion surcoreana se desarrollo de diferentes formas y metodos.
					
					Los medios de prensa reportaron con urgencia las noticias sobre la lucha con velas transmitiendo en detalles la demanda e insistencia de la poblacion. 
					
					Coincidiendo con la lucha con velas en el Sur de Corea, los compatriotas residentes en Estados Unidos, Japon, Canada, Francia, Alemania y otras partes del mundo tambien realizaron la misma forma de lucha, el movimiento de declaracion sobre la situacion y las manifestaciones de solidaridad con la poblacion surcoreana. 
					
					La sublevacion de la poblacion surcoreana para construir un nuevo mundo independiente, democratico y reunificado fue una enconada batalla con las fuerzas traidoras y conservadoras y las otras serviles a agrandes potencias. 
					
					Los conservadores surcoreanos publicaron la carta blanca encomiando los "meritos" de Park Geun-hye realizados durante su mandato e hicieron todo lo posible para mantener las politicas antinacionales, anti-reunificacion y antipopulares ya fracasadas. 
					
					El presidente interino Hwang Kyo An impidio el registro del equipo de la inspeccion especial sobre Chongwadae y la prolongacion del periodo de investigacion y se apresuro por eliminar las pruebas materiales del crimen dando de baja los telefonos celulares para el trabajo de los altos funcionarios publicos. 
					
					La Accion Emergente de la Poblacion y otras entidades sociales y civiles y los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea intensificaron la lucha insistiendo en que la revolucion de velas no puede terminar en la civil inconclusa como la sublevacion de junio de 1987 y hay que destituir a Park por la fuerza si ella no acepta la demanda verbal.
					
					Gracias a la incasable lucha de la poblacion despertada, el equipo de inspeccion especial y la "Corte Constitucional" se vieron obligados a confirmar los dias 6 y 10 de marzo, respectivamente, los crimenes de la traidora Park y tomar la decision final sobre su dimision. 
					
					La sublevacion popular dejo imborrables huellas en la historia de luchas masivas del Sur de Corea y demostro que se arruinan sin falta las fuerzas injustas como Park Geun-hye que desafian a la aspiracion de la poblacion y a la corriente de la epoca despreciando al pueblo y que nadie puede vencer al pueblo unido a base de la justicia y la verdad.
					
					La situacion tragica de Park Geun-hye y la banda conservadora del Sur de Corea es el resultado merecido de sus intolerables crimenes de haber recurrido a los actos vendepatrias, el servilismo a grandes potencias, el enfrentamiento fratricida, las politicas antipopulares, la dominacion fascista y los casos de irregularidades y corrupcion.

articles.title: Park Geun-hye ira a la carcel: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Park Geun-hye ira a la carcel: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- Actua todavia con altaneria Park Geun-hye, expulsada de Chongwadae con la deshonra de "primera presidenta destituida" en la historia de la politica surcoreana.
					En lugar de arrepentirse de sus errores, trata de buscar la salvacion en desacatar la sentencia de dimision declarada por la Corte Constitucional.
					
					Ella reclama su "inocencia" y la "sentencia injusta" y fundo una organizacion privada llamada "equipo del barrio Samsong" para evitar el encarcelamiento.
					
					Niega totalmente 13 sospechas de delito atribuidas por la fiscalia y la inspeccion especial y refuerza el panel de abogados para hacer frente a la investigacion de fiscalia.
					
					Esta conducta desafiante a la severa sentencia de la justicia y la opinion publica demuestra que ella es una vibora.
					
					La reciente decision de destitucion significa una advertencia seria de la historia de que a la diabla y peor traidora Park le tocan siempre el arruinamiento y la muerte.
					
					Ella fue sentenciada debidamente por sus incontables crimenes, entre otros, actos vendepatrias, servilismo a grandes potencias, confrontacion fratricida, politica antipopular, gobernacion fascista y corrupcion.
					
					Sin embargo, la ex mandataria surcoreana habla todavia de la supuesta "verdad" y niega todos sus delitos de mayor gravedad, hecho que deja consternado a todo el mundo.
					
					Los surcoreanos de diferentes estratos le critican calificando su comportamiento como "climax de arrogancia" y "protesta a la historia y al pueblo" y hasta en el interior del "Partido de Corea Libre" se escuchan las voces de censura.
					
					Entre tanto, los medios de prensa ridiculizan la actitud desobediente de Park quien cayo en la situacion miserable de hoy debido a su torpeza e imprudencia.
					
					Si ella hubiera presentado a tiempo la renuncia viendo la voluntad del pueblo en las manifestaciones con velas escenificadas en todo el suelo surcoreano, no habria llegado al destino tan desafortunado de ahora.
					
					Rehuso hasta el final la opinion publica haciendo al panel de abogados refutar los argumentos de la fiscalia y a los gangsteres conservadores sobornados, realizar los mitines de respuesta con velas.
					
					Es muy ridiculo que esa mujerzuela actuara todavia con altaneria tratando de evitar su encarcelamiento con la ayuda de algunos imbeciles que frecuentan al barrio Samsong.
					
					El encarcelamiento de ella es su destino inevitable.

articles.title: ACNC ridiculiza la obstinada campana fratricida de complices de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC ridiculiza la obstinada campana fratricida de complices de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 21 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente interino surcoreano, Hwang Kyo An, sigue fomentando el enfrentamiento fratricida calumniando a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aun despues de la dimision de la traidora Park Geun-hye. 
					Tan pronto como se diera la decision final de la Corte Constitucional, el llamo por telefono al ministro de Defensa Han Min Gu y al canciller Yun Pyong Se y les instruyo "prepararse perfectamente para frenar la voluntad de provocacion del Norte (de Corea) y responder inmediatamente a cualquier tipo de provocacion y fortalecer la colaboracion Sur de Corea-EE.UU. y la otra con los paises amistosos para hacer frente a la provocacion nuclear y de misil del Norte". 
					
					En su "declaracion al pueblo" sobre la dimision de Park, Hwang acuso a la parte connacional usando expresiones como la "amenaza nuclear y de misil del Norte" y la "firme seguridad". Y convoco la reunion de seguridad en que mando a todo el ejercito que se mantenga de alerta. 
					
					Hace poco, acudio al puesto de mando en el tiempo de guerra del Cuartel General del Estado Mayor Conjunto donde insistio en "tomar la firme disposicion de seguridad para que el Norte no pueda cometer una provocacion imprudente juzgando mal la situacion de emergencia nunca vista, causada en el Sur de Corea por la decision de la Corte Constitucional sobre la dimision de la presidenta".
					
					Esto no pasa de ser un proceder ridiculo para eludir la actual crisis de dominacion creada por la destitucion de la traidora Park cuyo nombre fue registrado como ignominia mas grande en la historia politica del Sur de Corea y para desviar las criticas y burla de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Por muy desesperados que fueran sus esfuerzos por crear la "crisis e incertidumbre de seguridad", Hwang no puede encubrir su tremendo crimen cometido en confabulacion con la traidora Park Geun-hye ni eludir las criticas de la indignada poblacion surcoreana.
					
					El es el complice principal que trajo la actual crisis del Sur de Corea y primer traidor que debe ser sentenciado por la historia junto con Park.
					
					Desde el comienzo del Ano Nuevo, expuso su malsano intento de mantener la "politica anti-Norte" de caracter antinacional de la traidora Park, calificada como residuo de la historia, con los disparates como "mantenimiento de base y principio" e invento hasta el rumor de la "posible provocacion del Norte en febrero".
					
					Lejos de sacar la leccion del destino tragico de Park, Hwang, residuo partidario de ella, sigue recurriendo a la fracasada politica de enfrentamiento fratricida para eludir la responsabilidad de la crisis actual y reagrupa a las fuerzas conservadoras hablando de la "crisis de seguridad", lo cual es intolerable burla e insulto a la poblacion surcoreana. 
					
					Ahora, los habitantes surcoreanos desean unanimemente acoger la primavera tras eliminar a todas las escorias humanas. 
					
					Los gusanos como Hwang seran condenados a la muerte por la historia.
